TopicTitle: Our First Brave Steps, .90 career with mods

Articles.Content:
A newly budding space program, just out of its seed, Pancake Space Enterprises, was ready for its first launch. Its first journey to whatever lay above. The launch was basically a small science grab to get the first node :|

The mission went well. A good first stage ignition (which will not always happen seeing as how I am using Dangit!) led to a sub-orbital hop over to the mountains. Below we have landed. As you can see, we have no decouplers yet... so our only option was to let the booster explode on impact.. We got enough science for the node, and completed a contract- "Launch a New Vessel".

So, due to the slow start of KSP's career mode, I will leave it here. I will assume nobody wants to watch three or fur boring grind missions back to back.

Next Episode: Reaching higher!
